title: Romena Rollana (Kyiv Light Rail)
text:
Romena Rollana () is a station on the <a href="Kyiv%20Light%20Rail">Kyiv Light Rail</a>. It was opened in 1977.
From September 30, 2019, Romena Rollana serves as the final stop of tram routes <a href="Trams%20in%20Kyiv%23Routes">No 2</a> and <a href="Trams%20in%20Kyiv%23Routes">No 3</a> during the reconstruction of <a href="Kiltseva%20Doroha%20%28Kyiv%20Light%20Rail%29">Kiltseva Doroha</a>.
